tools.httpserver
Class UserTransaction

java.lang.Object
  tools.httpserver.UserTransaction
All Implemented Interfaces:
HttpConstants
public class UserTransaction
extends java.lang.Object
implements HttpConstants

This class integrate methods to analyze HTTP message between a client (browser) and the http(s) server.

Version:
1.0
Author:
k.mittig

public void init(UserSession connection,

Parameters:

clientSocket - End-user socket (no multiplexing)

readStream

public java.lang.String readStream()
Read HTTP client request. DataInputStream is used to switch between char reader for HTTP header and byte header for body.

Returns:
HTTP request header TODO: implement a new InputStream reader to avoid readline deprecated method

read

public java.lang.String read()
Read stream coming from client.

Returns:
"REFUSED" if request is illegal, "POST" if the message was a post and requested URL if message was a valid GET

identifyUser

public User identifyUser()
Try to identify user by looking on request body

Returns:
founded user, or null if no match

Check if a requested object (GET) must be redirected to root page (index.html)

Parameters:
uri - the requested uri to check
Returns:
the corrected uri, if needed
